trends: there has been one other sighting in blue springs\lees summit
there were no other sightings in blue springs\lees summit on or around october 5th 2011
Summary: 6 lights or so in sky hovering above the high way then got a closer look and it was a trangular shape
divs: sighting detailsi and 7 other employees that work with me were in our company van. we were driving back to lenexa kansas from lees summit \blue springs missouri area. all of a sudden by the royals statium we see lights hovering above the high way i 70 we caught it on video on one of the employees phones. it looked like it was about 5oo ft from the ground and in the shape of a circle but as we got closer it seemed to be a triangular shape . there was no noise comming from the ufo . it had blue and white lights flashing all over . the lights were so bright it almost blinded me driving . it really shook us all up we could not belive what we had seen.
